name: places/ChIJIcRFX2L2wokRbHxd-qNa41k
formattedAddress: 632 W 147th St #4318, New York, NY 10031, USA
adrFormatAddress: 632 W 147th St #4318, New York, NY 10031-4318, USA

originalText.text: If I could give zero stars, I would. This dentist is the epitome of unprofessionalism. I had a few cavities that I wanted him to take care of, and after looking at them, he leaned and asked me “looking at your teeth, I wanted to know if you do meth”. Now while I will admittedly say that I needed some work done, they did not look that bad, and I was extremely offended as he sat there and snickered, and tried to brush it off.  There was another occasion where I asked him what should be done with a tooth and he referred me to a root canal specialist home I went to and after spending close to $1000 on a root canal, came back to him and he looked at the tooth, and then said “oh we should extract it.” I then asked him why he would have me go somewhere and pay close to $1000 for a root canal only to suggest extracting the tooth. He then shrugged and said “I don’t really remember what I said”, and then tried to backtrack further. I even have audio of him becoming argumentative and stuttering. Someone with close ties to him in the office even told me how he was threatened with a lawsuit for shabby work that he did and then had to fix. I went there trying to support a small business when in actuality, he need to be shut down and have is dental license revoked, honestly. Go elsewhere for better care and an updated office that doesn’t look like an embalming room.

originalText.text: Wish I had found Dr. Hendy sooner! He has told me things about my teeth no other dentist did. In addition, my teeth have never looked better! He has such a gentle touch, makes me less apprehensive to get work done. Highly recommend!

text.text: Wish I had found Dr. Hendy sooner! He has told me things about my teeth no other dentist did. In addition, my teeth have never looked better! He has such a gentle touch, makes me less apprehensive to get work done. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: My experiences with Dr. Hendy have been overwhelmingly positive. I typically dread going to the dentist, but with Dr. Hendy, I nearly look forward to it- well, maybe that is a bit of a stretch, but you get my point. Dr. H and staff are friendly, thorough and skilled. High marks all around.

text.text: My experiences with Dr. Hendy have been overwhelmingly positive. I typically dread going to the dentist, but with Dr. Hendy, I nearly look forward to it- well, maybe that is a bit of a stretch, but you get my point. Dr. H and staff are friendly, thorough and skilled. High marks all around.

originalText.text: Dr. Hendy has been my dentist for the past 20+ years.  I trust his work and his judgment.  He will tell you honestly what needs to be done and not waste your time or money with heroics.  He also has relationships with other dental specialist (ie. implants) that he can refer you to if necessary. Dr. Hendy and his staff are very down to earth and make you feel like family.

originalText.text: Great work, the staff is very friendly and helpful with any questions. The dentist is very gentle and helpful to make the best decision for your dental care. Once you arrived it's  quick being seen once you arrive for your appointment.
